#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long t,n,i,j,arr[1002]={0},ans1,ans2,ct,sum1,sum2;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ans1=ans2=sum1=sum2=0;
	  cin>>n;
	  for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	  cin>>arr[i];
	  sort(arr,arr+n);
	  cin>>ct;
	  sum1=arr[0];sum2=arr[n-1];
		if(sum1<=ct)
		i=1,ans1=1;
		else i=0,ans1=0;
		if(sum2<=ct)
		j=n-2,ans2=1;
		else j=n-1,ans2=0;
		while((sum1<ct || sum2<ct) && i<=j)
		{
			if(sum1<sum2)
			 {
			sum1+=arr[i]; 
			if(sum1<=ct) ans1++,i++;
			}
			else 
			{
			sum2+=arr[j];
			if(sum2<=ct) ans2++,j--;
			}
 
		}
	  
	  printf("%lld %lld\n",ans2,ans1);	
	}
	return 0;
}
